title: CE Compass Yongnuo Professional YN-568EX Wireless TTL Flash Speedlite Speedlight For Nikon D700 D3 D3s D3x D2x D300 D300S D7000 D90 D80 D70 D70S D60 D3000 D3100
description:
YN568EX has wireless remote flash system as slave unit. It with high-speed 
sync (FP flash), the YN568EX can synchronize with all shutter speeds, the 
maximum shutter sync up to 1/8000.One YN568EX is able to respectively accept internal flashing of 580EX II, 
SB-900/800/700, 7D/60D/600D, C order of N's internal flashing and ST-E2 wireless 
signal, achieves external TTL and manual flashing. Some beckoning functions such 
as wireless TTL flashing, grouping light ratio TTL flashing and the illumination 
of remote controlled flashing can be easily attained only if you carry a camera 
with built-in flashing command system and YN568EX.Features:Support High-Speed SYNC Flash: With high-speed sync (FP flash), the YN568EX 
can synchronize with all shutter speeds, the maximum shutter sync up to 1/8000.Ultra -long-range Wireless Flash: YN568EX can receive remote wireless signal. 
The longest distance used indoors is 25 meters/82 feet and the longest distance 
used outdoor is 15 meters/49 feet.Support i-TTL Functions: In the case of remote mode, HSS, FEC, FEB, FEV, 
Rear-curtain sync, Depth-of-fired, FE lock, Modeling Light.Suitable for:Hot-shoe Mode Support:Nikon D4, D3x, D3s, D3, D2x, D40, D40x, D60Nikon D600, D800E, D800, D700, D300s, D300, D200, D7000, D90, D80, D5200, D5100, 
D5000, D3100, D3000Wireless Slave Mode Support:Nikon Commander SU-800Nikon: SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700Nikon: Camera with CLS i-TTL system: D3x, D3s, D3, D2x, D700, D300s, D300, D200, 
D7000, D90, D80Canon: 7D, 60D, 600D, 650DCanon Flash 580EX IICanon Commander ST-E2Package Includes:1  YN568EX Flash Light1  Protecting Bag1  Mini Stand1  English Manual
